long_description: The leakproof, vacuum-insulated Stanley Outdoor Vacuum Bottle keeps your favorite drink hot or cold for up to 24 hrs. while you're on the trail or at work. Double-wall stainless-steel construction provides excellent insulation and stands up to regular use in the outdoors and at the work site. 18/8 stainless steel won't rust; naturally BPA-free. Lid separates into 2 cups for sharing. Stanley Outdoor Vacuum Bottle is leakproof and fully packable. Closeout.
short_description: The leakproof, vacuum-insulated Stanley Outdoor Vacuum Bottle keeps your favorite drink hot or cold for up to 24 hrs. while you're on the trail or at work.
